Classes

class  QPXSL
 Provide tools for running XSL Transformation (XSLT) on a document. More...

Detailed Description

Provide QueryPath with XSLT support using the PHP libxslt module.

This is called 'QPXSL' instead of 'QPXSLT' in accordance with the name of the PHP extension that provides libxslt support.

You must have PHP XSL support for this to function.

Author:
M Butcher <matt@aleph-null.tv> http://opensource.org/licenses/lgpl-2.1.php LGPL or MIT-like license.
